page1.title: Khido Khundi
page1.description: Two Indian brothers return from London to their home country and form a field hockey team.

page1.title: Daana Paani
page1.description: An army officer is tasked with personally informing the families of the martyrs in his regiment. Along the way, he develops an unexpected attraction to a troubled young woman.

page1.title: Chauthi Koot
page1.description: Chauthi Koot, based on two short stories by the acclaimed author Waryam Singh Sandhu, is set in the “1980s Punjab” when a Sikh separatist movement was in full cry in the state. A critically acclaimed movie!!

page1.title: Laung Laachi
page1.description: A husband and wife decide to live as strangers.

page1.title: Lambhardarni
page1.description: Two men continue a war between families after one kills the other's father in a fit of rage.

page1.title: Maa Da Dharminder
page1.description: A diehard fan of Dharmendra is a source of fun for all villagers who leave no chance to mock at him. His story takes a turn when he starts loving a girl and a film agent dupes money from him.

page2.title: Jatt Jeona Mour
page2.description: A religious man (Gugu Gill) becomes a bandit who seeks revenge against injustice. It is based on the life of Dacoital Jatt Jeona Morh. A super hit Punjabi movie!!

page2.title: Man Jeete Jag Jeet
page2.description: A teacher uses her strength and faith to change the fortunes of a group of bandits.A 1973 religious Punjabi film directed by B.S. Thapa

page2.title: Munde Patiale De
page2.description: It is a story of three college friends Samar, Gill and Lucky, who meet up after a long time at Samar's wedding, and the funny situations that they land up in, makes for the plot.

page2.title: Saidan Jogan
page2.description: Saida Jogan is a widely successful Punjabi film and is a lovely story that has an all-time appeal due to its emotional base about human behavior which leads to a complex situation if two people are deeply in love and are indifferent to the society.

page2.title: Sardari
page2.description: A newly appointed Police Officer, Ravinder Singh, questions terrorists' related deaths of his family as well as deal with the fact that his younger brother had raped and killed a village woman, and was shot dead while trying to escape from police custody.

page2.title: Sarpanch
page2.description: A story of a man of principles who has sacrificed his life for his village. A man who would even sacrifice his own son in order to set an example for the rest of the village.

page3.title: Shaheed Udham Singh
page3.description: Based on the true story of a freedom fighter who avenged the massacre of many of his countrymen by the British. This movie won the Nargis Dutt Award for Best Feature Film on National Integration.

page3.title: Jagga
page3.description: Jagga is a 1964 Punjabi blockbuster film, directed by Jugal Kishore, starring Dara Singh, Indira, Khairati, Amarnath, Jugal Kishore, MajnuIt won the National Film Award for Best Feature Film in Punjabi for the year 1964.

page3.title: Tabaahi
page3.description: When honest Thanedar Harnek Singh comes to know that Mantri Balwant Singh is involved in drug trafficking, he decides to expose him at any and all costs.

page3.title: Tabbar Sheikh Chilli da
page3.description: This movie shows a family who aspires to be very successful and all they do is just dream. But dreams do not come true by only just thinking. They require effort and hard-work. A comedy movie!!

page3.title: Toti Tangewala
page3.description: Toti Tangewala is a story about a character of the same name. The film deals with his journey to local places and his actions against social issues and mal practices in the society. A comedy-drama!!

page3.title: Truck Driver
page3.description: Jeeto's husband is murdered by Bukkan and his men in retaliation for his testimony in court. She senses a great storm coming to save the cowards in the village that do not speak against tyranny. An action-packed family drama!!

page4.title: Nain Preeto De
page4.description: A 1995 Punjabi action packed romantic drama starring Yograj,Ravinder Mann,Bhagwant Mann,Pargat Bhaggu.

page4.title: Pardessan
page4.description: A classic 1969 super hit Punjabi movie starring  Indira, Prem Chopra, Khairati. Directed by K. Zaman. Music by Verma Malik.

page4.title: Phillauri
page4.description: A young man, Kanan, ties the knot with a tree, in order to get rid of a curse which might affect his married life. But, by marrying the tree, he also marries the spirit that haunts it. (Punjabi Dubbed Version)

page4.title: Badla Jatti Da
page4.description: Pregnant Gulabo is devastated when her entire family is slaughtered by Jaildar Jung Singh and his goons, when the latter finds out that her brother-in-law, Jasbinder, had dared to woo his daughter, Bebo. A blockbuster Punjabi action movie!!

page4.title: Anokhe Amar Shaheed Baba Deep Singh Ji
page4.description: Baba Deep Singh fights with the tyrant Mughal Emperor Ahmad Shah Abdali and sacrifices his life, enshrining the sanctity of the sacred Sikh religion.

page4.title: Family 426
page4.description: A comedy film which revolves around a 10 crore diamond robbery. The crazy members of Family 426 fall into the prey of this robbery and try to solve out the mystery.

page5.title: Pratigya
page5.description: Dilawar, the bandit, kills a man who's trying to protect his daughter's honor from an accomplice of the bandit. The girl dies, and the dying man's cries of agony make Dilawar reform, and he gives up his life as an outlaw. Super hit movie!!

page5.title: Family 428
page5.description: Gurchet Chittarkar portrays the role of a married man who eyes on other girls. He wishes to have an extramarital affair with a beautiful girl from his village. His entire family including his wife knows about it and tries to bring him on track.

page5.title: Family 422
page5.description: A Punjabi family comedy film showing that singing is not everybody cup of tea and how self-proclaimed singers take patronage to earn fame and money.

page5.title: Rano
page5.description: The story is about a girl who lives in a small village of Punjab and on falling in love she has to face the ire of family and society, but she emerges a winner in spite of all odds. A classic blockbuster Punjabi movie!!

page5.title: Ek Kargil Hor
page5.description: This movie touches a very sensitive issue of farmer suicides in Punjab and in India. How the farmers have choice expect suicide after they are forced to take debt or trapped into the deadly cycle of debt and its after-effects.

page5.title: Ek Jind Ek Jaan
page5.description: A woman's (Ritu Shivpuri) brother (Deep Dhillon) becomes furious when her boyfriend (Raj Babbar) rejects her.

page6.title: Dukh Bhanjan Tera Naam
page6.description: A Punjabi movie about Sikhism. It portrays the people’s belief in the almighty God who is one and how life teaches a lesson to those who does not believe so. A classic hit movie!!

page6.title: Dhee Punjab Di
page6.description: Dhee Punjab Di portrays the injustice to the poor and the downtrodden. A rich man rapes a poor young woman but she decides to rise up to fight against the injustice done to them. Will she be successful in taking her revenge?

page6.title: Bhangra
page6.description: Sunder, the son of a moneylender, falls in love with Banto, the daughter of a poor farmer. However, Mehnga Mall, who also loves Banto, decides to bribe Sunder to stay away from Banto. A classic musical blockbuster!!

page6.title: Batwara
page6.description: A story about two loving brothers who fall into the hands of relatives and circumstances and start hating each other.A super hit action movie!!

page6.title: Dangar Doctor Jelly
page6.description: Welcome to the world of Dangar Doctor Jelly where chaos reigns when Ravinder Grewal's in-laws pay him a visit at his house. What follows next is utter confusion and a laugh riot.

page6.title: Kirdar E Sardar
page6.description: Based on the life of a Punjabi boxer, it defines the true spirit and power of being a Khalsa(Pure).The movie also showcases the problems of drug addiction, which is one of the perennial social evils prevalent in Punjab. An action drama!

page7.title: IK Onkar
page7.description: Ik Onkar: The Revolution as a title itself portrays the message of Oneness in the society. Banned in India, the film focuses on various issues like drug abuse, rapes and farmer suicides in Punjab.

page7.title: Bhagat Singh Di Udeek
page7.description: An Army officer makes it his own personal mission to fight injustice.A Punjabi action drama movie starring Arsh Chawla and B. N. Sharma in prominent roles.

page7.title: Wattanaan Ton Door
page7.description: It is about three friends Jagjit, Dharam, and Sukhbir. Dharam, in order to get his sister married and to pay off the heavy debts, decides to go to Germany and earn a handsome amount.

page7.title: Mitter Pyare Nu Haal Mureedan Da Kehna
page7.description: Set in the backdrop of the partition of India and Pakistan, the movie is about how two brothers and their widowed mother are uprooted from their ancestral town.

page7.title: Luv U Bobby
page7.description: This is a love story set in a modern Punjab, where a boy and girl fall in love but their arch-rival families come in their way.

page7.title: Chak De Phatte
page7.description: The story revolves around Simran who is a Canadian NRI working as a manager at a local cafeteria in Chandigarh.A 2008 Indian Punjabi comedy adventure film!!

page9.title: Wagah
page9.description: When war claims her husband on her wedding night, a young widow dedicates the rest of her life to helping others. Through her charitable work in Pakistan, she meets an NRI who needs her assistance -- but he also confesses he wants to marry her.

page9.title: Yaar Maar
page9.description: A 1993 Punjabi movie starring Yograj Singh,Neena,Simran,Bindu Jhokia,Suksha Lahoria.

page9.title: Nanak Nam Jahaz Hai
page9.description: A faithless woman divides a deep friendship while another woman's love helps rebuild a man's shattered life.(Digital Color Format Version)

page9.title: Yaaran Da Katchup
page9.description: The story revolves around three friends who love each other more than they love themselves. These college friends get together for a reunion after seven years to celebrate their 'Ohi Day'. The catch-up destination is Thailand.

page9.title: Mannat
page9.description: A just-widowed army officer searches for his daughter after a woman, desperate to become a mother, steals the newborn.

page9.title: Dharti
page9.description: A rift forms between a political leader (Prem Chopra) and his younger son (Jimmy Shergill).This was the first Punjabi political suspense thriller film !!

page10.title: Des Hoyaa Pardes
page10.description: Violence and terrorism jeopardize the love between a simple farmer (Gurdas Mann) and the daughter (Juhi Chawla) of a police officer.

page10.title: Yoddha
page10.description: Yoddha is based on the life of a simple person, but circumstances turn him into a warrior who fights against the atrocities of the establishment and its agents.

page10.title: Lad Gaya Pecha
page10.description: A man is trying to get married he tries to kill himself after he falls in love with a ghost and is also in love with a human being. Who Will He Choose?

page10.title: Judge Singh LLB
page10.description: In order to protect his son and his reputation, a politician uses his influence to frame a middle-class boy in a murder actually committed by his son. A Punjabi courtroom drama film!!

page10.title: Taur Mittran Di
page10.description: Taur Mittran Di shows the degrading living status of the players of the sport, Hockey. The plot revolves around the story of two rivals in a university who later join hands to uplift hockey and the condition of hockey players in the country.

page10.title: Simran
page10.description: A 2010 Punjabi movie starring Gughu Gill, Surjit khan, Sadhika Randhawa, Sheetal Bedi, Sonia Kanchan, Sudesh Lahiri & Others.Directed by Darshan Bagga.

page12.title: Romeo Ranjha
page12.description: Romeo and Ranjha live in Punjab and goes to Thailand to fulfill their dreams.One day accidentally they meet each other and get very excited to know that they both are from Punjab and become good friends.

page12.title: Rabb Ne Banaiyan Jodiean
page12.description: Facing the wrath of their elitist father, two brothers must choose between love and family. When a wealthy businessman refuses to allow his oldest son to marry the lower-caste woman he loves, the son's defiance puts her life in jeopardy.

page12.title: Rabb Da Radio
page12.description: A couple from vastly different economic backgrounds struggle to keep their budding romance alive amidst escalating family pressure.

page12.title: Punjab 1984
page12.description: Punjab 1984 is a 2014 Indian Punjabi period drama film directed by Anurag Singh. It is based on the 1984–86 Punjab insurgency's impact on social life, notably it is a story of a mother and her missing son.

page12.title: Proud to Be a Sikh
page12.description: The movie is based on the life of a gursikh professor who comes to his home country with lots of aspirations and feelings for his heritage and culture, as he had to leave the country during 1984.

page12.title: Power Cut
page12.description: The movie mocks the power outages and corruption in the country, especially in a particular state. It was the last film directed by Late Jaspal Bhatti.

page13.title: Oh My Pyo Ji
page13.description: Oh My Pyo is a 2014 romantic comedy Punjabi film co-directed and co-produced by Rai Yuvraj Singh & Niharika Sahni.Watch the hilarious adventures of Binnu, Babbal and their wise old Pyo!!

page13.title: Oh Yaara Ainvayi Ainvayi Lut Gaya
page13.description: Ranbir Singh falls in love with Gunjan and gets married.But one day Gunjan files a divorce case against him.A 2015 Punjabi romantic comedy film written and directed by Raj Sinha.

page13.title: Sadda Haq
page13.description: A modern-day Canadian Sikh graduate travels to India to do a thesis based on the minorities involved in the war.It becomes the highest grossing Punjabi film to ever hit theatres in Canada.

page13.title: Rustam-E-Hind
page13.description: A 2008 Punjabi movie starring Guggu Gill, B.N.Sharma. Directed by Sarabjit Beniwal.

page13.title: Munde U.K. De
page13.description: Born in the United Kingdom, two East Indian men fall in love while visiting Punjab for the first time.The movie became a blockbuster!!

page13.title: Mr . & Mrs. 420
page13.description: Deputy wants to be an actor like Dharmander but has to settle for playing Saroopnakha in local Ramlila because of the lack of opportunity. On the other hand, he is unemployed and in love with a girl who will only marry if he finds a job.

page14.title: Munde Kamaal De
page14.description: Amrinder Gill & Yuvraj Hans Fall in love with the daughters of Bhalla Sahib. However, they are physically Challenged as Amrinder is deaf & Yuvraj is dumb. due to which they face a hard time in convincing Bhalla sahib.

page14.title: Mirza – The Untold Story
page14.description: Mirza and Sahiba fall in love at a young age and they lose track of each other until they reach adulthood.Mirza: The Untold Story is based on the legendary love story of Mirza and Sahiba.

page14.title: Mel Karade Rabba
page14.description: Rajveer thinks he's got everything he needs in the world, besides love which he thinks he can get from Seerat, but he can't since Seerat replies that she is in love with Nihaal.The movie became the biggest Punjabi Hit of 2010.

page14.title: Mehndi Waley Hath
page14.description: The story of this Punjabi Film moves around an educated middle class family's boy Gaivi and his mother who thinks his son is a blank cheque and wants him to get married to a rich girl who can bring wealth to her.

page14.title: Marriage Da Garriage
page14.description: Two friends start up a unique business following their release from prison.Marriage da garriage is debut movie of famous singer Hans raj hans`s son Navraj hans.

page14.title: Nanak Naam Chardi Kala
page14.description: Movie Nanak Naam Chardi Kala praises Sikhism and its values. An ardent devotee of Guru Nanak Dev Ji loses his religious path as he grows up. Influenced by the western culture he cuts his hair. What will happen now?

page15.title: Mar Jawan Gur Khake
page15.description: Jimmy and Rocky are two enemies who are involved in fights/brawls daily. They both fall in love with Mahek who is already in love with a secret-gangster Karan. A rom-com!!

page15.title: Kaun Dilan Diyan Jaane
page15.description: Kaun Dilan Diyan Jaane' is a story that revolves around a guy name Paramjit who had to leave his family and settle in Calgary the heart of Canada to earn his bread. Miles away from his home and his family Paramjit always felt homesick.

page15.title: Jugaadi Dot Com
page15.description: This film is based on real-life incidents and is all about money. `Jugaadi Baba` named Birbal Baba sets up a darbar called `Birbal Darbar` for his followers where he solves the problems of his followers by fooling them.

page15.title: Jatts In Golmaal
page15.description: A gang leader in need of a heart transplant tries to get one from a dimwitted man.A comedy entertainer!!

page15.title: Jatt in Mood
page15.description: The story of 'Jatt in Mood' is based on two young boys Raj and Preet who always dream about big life. Two girls named Simran and Manreet are living with their uncle Karnal Karnail Singh Sandhu. Raj and Preet try to impress the girls but fail.

page15.title: Hero Hitler in Love
page15.description: Hero Hitler in Love revolves around the life of a man called Hitler who lives in his village, Ishqpura. Hitler is a man with unique and different thoughts, who loves his fellow villagers and helps soul-mates come together.

page16.title: Heer Ranjha : A True Love Story
page16.description: A man finds true love after the death of his father. A recreation of one of several popular tragic romances of Punjab, the story of the love of Heer and her lover Ranjha.

page16.title: Hashar : A Love Story...
page16.description: Hashar" is the story of today's young generation who without true feelings of love, get together and later due to misunderstandings their life becomes tumultuous.

page16.title: Majaajan
page16.description: Majajan is about a love that knows no caste or creed, and it fights all resistance and hindrances that come in its way.

page16.title: Goreyan Nu Daffa Karo
page16.description: Boundaries are crossed when a relationship develops between two people from different cultures and countries.

page16.title: Ekam : Son of Soil
page16.description: Ekam – Son of Soil is about family relations and family disputes. It's about village life and a journey of a hero from metro city to a village where he helps not just the poor farmers but also the drug ridden youth.

page16.title: Family Chhadeyan Di
page16.description: Though they're ready to marry, three men have trouble finding brides in this amusing Indian farce that has a serious underlying message.

page17.title: Ek Noor
page17.description: 'Ek Noor' is a sincere attempt to bring across the audience the message on the noble cause of organ donation and a sincere attempt to make the audience aware of life after death.

page17.title: Apni Boli Apna Des
page17.description: Apni Boli Apna Des is directed by Ravindra Peepat and featured Raj Babbar and Gurpreet Ghuggi as lead characters.

page17.title: Fer Mamla Gadbad Gadbad
page17.description: A romantic-comedy story revolving around an aspiring actor ‘Jassi’ who dreams of making a movie and launch himself as a ‘hero’.

page17.title: Dil Apna Punjabi
page17.description: A man (Harbhajan Mann) must choose between two women after he leaves his sweetheart (Neeru Bajwa) to find fame in London.

page17.title: Dil Pardesi Ho Gaya
page17.description: Major Ram, from the Indian Army, is held captive in Pakistan after a war. His brother Sunny, takes upon himself to save him. He lands up in Pakistan and meets Rukhsar, daughter of a Pakistani brigadier. Their love sparks!!

page17.title: Desi Romeos
page17.description: Six young men become very popular for their music as they go from hostel to house and meet young women.

page18.title: Chak Jawana
page18.description: 'Chak Jawana' highlights the problems faced by youth in a Punjabi village. The young men fall prey to drugs, become irresponsible and disturb the peace. The elders despair about the future of their community.

page18.title: Bhua Ek Te Fufad Do
page18.description: Beebo Bhua cheats on her husband and marries a doctor. Her second husband happens to be a doctor. Beebo tries to make sure that both her husbands do not meet each other.Comedy Entertainer!!

page18.title: Baghi
page18.description: A villager fights oppression and helps underprivileged people.The film got National Award for best Punjabi film in 2007.

page18.title: Badla ......the revenge
page18.description: A 2003 Punjabi action movie starring  Guggu Gill, Ravinder Maan, Manjit Saini. Directed by Prince Dhaliwal.

page18.title: Babal Da Vehra
page18.description: A young man (Giordan Rana) goes to India to find his missing father and, upon learning of his father's death, discovers a whole new family.

page18.title: Aashiqui Not Allowed
page18.description: Bittu, an ambitious man, chooses the wrong way to earn quick money to repay a debt. In the process, he meets a dangerous criminal, Billu Bakra, and gets on his wrong side.

page19.title: Pinky Moge Wali
page19.description: A woman (Neeru Bajwa) stages her own kidnapping to gain attention from her wealthy father.The film's title Pinky Moge Wali comes from the popular character of Pinky introduced in the popular Punjabi movie Jihne Mera Dil Luteya.

page19.title: Full Nazare
page19.description: Full Nazare is a comedy play based on real-life incidents. Full Nazare contains life's facts with humor punches.

page19.title: Oye Hoye Pyar Ho Gaya
page19.description: Sharry falls for Meet. Chamkila who is also trying his chances on Meet gets envy of Sharry and tries tarnishing his image in front of Meet's family. After few failed attempts, he finally succeeds in his mission leaving Meet shattered.

page19.title: Jee Aayan Nu
page19.description: A man (Harbhajan Mann) must decide whether to leave India to be with the woman (Priya Gill) that he loves.It is one of the most successful movies in Punjabi cinema.

page19.title: Dushman
page19.description: Dushman is a story of two men, an Indian and a Pakistani national who meet abroad and turn from foes to friends for life.

page19.title: Vekh Baraathan Challiyan
page19.description: A Punjabi bus conductor falls in love with a Haryanvi girl, and then the comedy sets up when these different cultures get mingled up for marriage.

page20.title: Bhaji In Problem
page20.description: Sundeep leads a double life when he marries two women and keeps them from one another. His carefully planned life unravels when an old friend who knows his secret arrives looking to fall in love.

page20.title: Krazzy Tabbar
page20.description: An engaged couple appear to be destined for happiness, until their two families meet and the fireworks begin.

page20.title: Yaar Pardesi
page20.description: Two young women from Canada arrive in India and make friends with Kuku. Two of Kuku's friends try to convince the women to take them to Canada, and they begin an interesting journey.

page20.title: Mini Punjab
page20.description: A man's (Gurdas Mann) positive attitude and happiness affect members of a community.

page20.title: Lahoriye
page20.description: Lahoriye is about the effects of the partition of India on Punjab. The movie deals with the modern India and how did two people of different races and countries begin to love each other . The movie is completely set in 2017's India not in the 1947's.

page20.title: Gelo
page20.description: A working-class Punjabi woman battles the adverse conditions that farm laborers face, including an oppressive upper class and drug abuse.

page21.title: Darra
page21.description: Darra is a simple guy who is studying in an agricultural university and received various awards as well.One day the villagers decided to elect Darra as there new sarpanch candidate. But then Darra get killed by someone. Who is the killer?

page21.title: Bambukat
page21.description: A man ferries his love interest around on his bicycle until a wealthy man arrives with a motorbike. He realizes he has to upgrade his ride or risk losing the woman he loves.

page21.title: Eh Janam Tumhare Lekhe
page21.description: A Punjabi movie based on the life of "Bhagat Puran Singh".The film is an important chapter in the history of post - partition Punjab. An inspiring journey of a human being who commits a lifetime to serving humanity and preserving the environment.

page21.title: Teshan
page21.description: The Film is about the relations and simplicity of the village people, shown through different perspectives. It is a youth based film.

page21.title: Aatishbazi Ishq
page21.description: As their wedding day approaches, a young couple is harassed by an unstable man obsessed with the bride-to-be. A sizzling romantic thriller which revolves around three athletes.

page21.title: Sardaar Ji 2
page21.description: The story begins in a village in Punjab, where an organic farmer Jaggi lives his life. His village gets into trouble and Jaggi has to travel to Australia to earn money in order to save the village. A roller-coaster ride of action, humor, and romance.

page22.title: Happy Go Lucky
page22.description: Happy Go Lucky is a story of three sisters who desire their life partners to be Inspector, Singer, and a non-resident Indian. Coincidentally, when they speak of their desires, a father of three sons stands by listening to them.

page22.title: Haani
page22.description: HAANI is the story of these true men of the soil, the Jatts who are defined by their simplicity, honesty, courage, good looks & above all - for honoring their commitments lifelong, be it for love, friendship or even enmity.

page22.title: Pooja Kiven Aa
page22.description: Pooja, from the UK, visits Mumbai to sell her estate.  Three friends met Pooja and get a job in her home as cook, trainer, and cleaner while Pooja`s uncle tries to cheat Pooja over her property.A story of one girl and three guys!!

page22.title: Lock
page22.description: A screenwriter loses a script in the back of a rickshaw, and complications in the driver's life make it difficult to return to its rightful owner.

page22.title: Tera Mera Ki Rishta
page22.description: An adventurous man (Jimmy Sheirgill) and a traditional woman (Kulraj Randhawa) meet and fall in love.

page22.title: Tiger (Punjabi)
page22.description: In this gripping tale of revenge and survival, Pali has spent the last several years of his life in jail, counting down the days until he can go back to his small Punjabi village, Jungpura, and save its citizens from its rampant drug problem. Part of that problem is drug lord, Dilbagh, who leads young men into his business before they know any better.

page23.title: 25 Kille
page23.description: Four brothers receive news of an inheritance and must contend with an unscrupulous landowner to receive their birthright.

page23.title: Ardaas
page23.description: A story about how people in a village deal with everyday problems in Punjab and learn how to live.

page23.title: Layi Lagg
page23.description: Three young men get arrested for no reason at all. In jail, they meet a gangster who advises them to join him and they will become rich in no time. A hilarious entertainer!!

page23.title: Needhi Singh
page23.description: The story revolves around an easy, happy go lucky girl Needhi Singh, until a day that will change her life, forever. She becomes a rebel.

page23.title: Ghuggi Yaar Gupp Na Maar
page23.description: Watch Ghuggi in his best forms taking you through a laughter riot.

page23.title: Chhankata: Kadh Tiyan Kasraan
page23.description: This movie revolves around Oldie flirty chacha and his stories. Chacha's comic punches and his funny stories will take you to a laughter riot.

page24.title: Once Upon A Time In Amritsar
page24.description: Dilpreet and Gurjind set out to Amritsar, the holy abode of Sikhs, in search for the ulterior motive of their life and ask the Satguru to direct them towards the fulfillment of that motive. After seeking the blessings of the Almighty at the Golden temple, fate rolls the dice and their life undergoes a twist.

page24.title: Saadey CM Saab
page24.description: The film centers on three friends who dislike politics, and the problems when one becomes chief minister.

page24.title: Ajj De Ranjhe
page24.description: `Ajj De Ranjhe` is a satirical take on the state of the youth and the law and order system in Punjab. The film follows the journey of an unemployed youngster Ambar (Aman Dhaliwal) and a rookie cop, Manjeet (Gurpreet Ghuggi).

page24.title: Ambarsariya
page24.description: A secret agent who is posing as an insurance salesman tries to find an assassin, while also trying to juggle three women.

page24.title: Lovely Te Lovely
page24.description: An ambitious woman named Lovely once tells a lie, but to recover from that she falls into a trap of lies. It`s a rib-tickling comedy drama that revolves around people who want to take advantage of Randhawa`s affluent lifestyle.

page24.title: MySelf Pendu
page24.description: The plot revolves around two guys, Preet and Harpal, who keep making schemes to make themselves rich.The film takes a hilarious turn when the boys meet two rich girls and make a plan to get involved with the girls to extract money from them.

page25.title: Fateh
page25.description: A young boy`s childhood love is taken away from him and he has to fight the merciless criminals. What all transformations do this young chap go through forms the story of the film. First Punjabi film on Martial arts!!

page25.title: Disco Singh
page25.description: Laatu is a band musician that is in love with a model (Surveen Chawla) who is forced to be his girlfriend after being forced by a gangster.

page25.title: Daddy Cool Munde Fool
page25.description: A man and his brother love the daughters of the same mother that their Father loves.This is one Punjabi Wedding you can`t afford to miss!

page25.title: Bathinda Express
page25.description: This movie is about an athlete,whose passion was his game.He ran not to win the race but to win his life.

page25.title: Saadi Love Story
page25.description: A man is mistaken for another man, as he starts loving the woman who thinks that he is the true one.

page25.title: Aa Gaye Munde U.K. De
page25.description: The story revolves around a boy Roop who falls in love with Disha it was love at first sight. Aa Gaye Munde U.K. De is a sequel to the earlier blockbuster Munde U.K

page28.title: Yaaran Naal Baharan
page28.description: A story of Navdeep and Harman, two young college students who fall in love, making their life so different and beautiful... and difficult.

page28.title: Thana Shagna Da
page28.description: This super hit Punjabi movie shows the problem of dowry in a light-hearted way. A rich man refuses to marry his son to a middle-class girl. Jaspal Bhatti is strictly against dowry and wants to teach this man a lesson. Watch to find out more.

page28.title: Bade Changay Ne Mere Yaar Kaminey
page28.description: It is said true friendship never ends, no matter what. The whole story revolves around the married life of three friends.Two men maintain balanced married lives while a third leads the life of a playboy.

page28.title: Jatt Airways
page28.description: The film is a story of two young boys who wish to marry girls of the same household. They find sweet sisters, try to woo them and in the process get caught up in series of funny events which forms the plot of the film.

page28.title: Ghuggi Labhey Gharwali
page28.description: Ghuggi (Gurpreet Ghuggi) gets a dream that if he does not marry within a year he will die and will be reborn as a dog. Believing this dream he decides to find a bride. Fun filled situations follow. Who will marry Ghuggi?

page28.title: Dil Vil Pyaar Vyaar (Punjabi)
page28.description: The film portrays the emotions of five brothers and how the elder one of them wants to sacrifice his life for his younger brothers, while the younger ones would want the elder brother to get married and settled first.

page29.title: 22g Tussi Ghaint Ho
page29.description: A small town milk-vendor Boota Singh is forced into contesting elections, by his younger brother, as he is in love with the daughter of existing MLA, to match their family status. The life of this poor milk vendor goes haywire the day he files the nomination.

page29.title: Sardaar Ji
page29.description: A smart, young, fearless, Indian ghost hunter traps ghosts in bottles.

page29.title: Sirphire
page29.description: The film portrays how our rich cultural heritage, which is instilled in us from birth, gets overshadowed by other cultural influences and the way it leads the youngsters to immoral activities.

page29.title: Ronde Sare Vyah Picho
page29.description: When he realizes his wife is a con artist, a man reacts by stepping in as her much-needed protector. A big fat Indian wedding tied up with confused Bride!!

page29.title: Rangeelay
page29.description: Sonny is a collection agent. When he repossesses a scooter from Simmi, it's love at first sight. But she is free spirited, spoiled, cynical and does not believe in love. And she is also engaged to Ricky.

page29.title: Punjab Bolda
page29.description: The film draws reference from various historical events that have shaped Punjab be it the Anti-Sikh riots of 1984 or partition of India and touches upon the present scenario.

page31.title: Khamosh Pani
page31.description: Khamosh Pani: Silent Waters is about a widowed mother and her young son living in a Punjabi village as it undergoes radical changes during the late 1970s.

page31.title: Kalyug De Avtar Baba Balak Nath Ji
page31.description: A devotional movie about Sidh Baba Balak Nath  is also known as Paunahari or Dudhadhari is a Hindu deity known as the most gracious deity in Hinduism.

page31.title: Kabaddi Once Again
page31.description: It is the story of a village boy Shingara Singh who dreams to take Kabaddi game to international standards. His dream gets shattered when he comes to know that it is a big game of illegal human trafficking, drug mafia, and match fixing.

page31.title: Kabaddi Ikk Mohabbat
page31.description: Kabaddi Ikk Mohabbat is the first Punjabi movie based on the traditional & ethnic game of Kabaddi.Guggu Gill plays the role of a physically handicapped Kabaddi coach in this film. He decides to bring together a team against his rival one.

page31.title: Jatt & Juliet
page31.description: Jatt is a mischievous lovable sort of a guy whilst Juliet is the typical Punjabi modern day girl. Sparks fly when their paths cross on their way to Canada due to their different outlook on life.

page31.title: Jatt & Juliet 2
page31.description: Two Punjab Police officers head to Canada to solve on a mission. When they get to Canada, their mission isn't as simple as what they first thought.

page32.title: Ishq Brandy
page32.description: 3 friends from 3 different worlds, bound by their respective Ishq(Love), do something under the spell of Brandy that they unknowingly put their Ishq(s) at stake and what follows are rib-tickling sequences which decide their fate.

page32.title: Ik Kudi Punjab Di
page32.description: Ik Kudi Punjab Di is the story of a girl who challenges the male-dominated society of Punjab. She fights with her lover, her parents, and relatives. Her lover understands her feelings but must go against his parents to help her.

page32.title: Heer and Hero
page32.description: The story is about the dreams of the pivoting character Geet , who is being helped by her 3 friends, each one of them having a crush on her and want to marry her. A heady mix of Bollywood and Pollywood!!

page32.title: Family 430
page32.description: Gurchet Chitrakar is back again with his crazy family. This time the family discover that a treasure has been hidden somewhere near them at a secret location. Fun filled situations follow. Where will the treasure hunt lead this crazy family?

page32.title: Family 429
page32.description: A totally crazy family of 6 people land in Canada. They forget the address of the person they are supposed to visit. Luckily they find to meet a fellow Punjabi in Canada who takes them to her house. Find out why this family has paid a visit to Canada...

page32.title: Family 423
page32.description: A Punjabi Comedy Film That Describes the state of Baliya. A villager who is thrown out of his house and house of his in-laws as well. The villager has no option but to die. Watch to find out whether he lives or dies.

page34.title: Mitti
page34.description: It's a story about four guys who are best friends and their life changes after an incident take place.Mitti is a movie on Punjab's youth and their political arguments.

page34.title: Nawan Samaj
page34.description: Nava Samaj is a story based on two important killer facts of life, Females tortured for Dowry and Female Feticide.A Girl who leaves everything behind, and even changes her name and enters a new family and way she is treated is a shame for society.

page34.title: Naughty Jatts
page34.description: Naughty Jatts is a musical comedy about 3 jatts chasing one girl. Their unique ways to get her will leave you rolling in the aisles with laughter and keep you guessing who will finally get the girl!

page34.title: Mundeyan Ton Bachke Rahin
page34.description: A comedy about two serial daters who got their hearts broken at the age of 16 and vowed never to fall in love again but make girls fall in love with them and break their hearts now end up falling for the same girl.

page34.title: Channo Kamli Yaar Di
page34.description: Channo is an emotional journey of a very common Punjabi girl who went Canada to find her missing husband Jeet.

page34.title: 47 To 84 Hun Main Kisnu Watan Kahunga
page34.description: 47 to 84 is the journey of a young Sikh girl, Sukhmani, who loses all her loved ones and is forced to leave the newly-formed Pakistan during the partition.

page35.title: Faraar
page35.description: A man travelling to the United States meets a mysterious woman and gets wrapped up in an investigation when authorities mistake him for a notorious criminal.

page35.title: What The Jatt!!
page35.description: It is a nerve tickling adventurous comedy film about Raj and his friend Fateh, who hail from a village in Punjab. During their efforts to achieve their dreams they find themselves in hilarious situations that lead to a chain of unexpected events.

page35.title: Jatt James Bond
page35.description: Shinda was mistreated by his relatives, therefore, he finds other ways to have his love Laali. Shinda and his two other friends come up with a plan to solve all of their problems.

page35.title: Gadaar-The Traitor
page35.description: Jai Singh (Harbhajan Mann) is one of the richest Indians in the world who loves to live life on the edge. A conspiracy suddenly changes his life and brings him back to his motherland -

page35.title: Double Di Trouble
page35.description: The film is based on Shakespeare`s well-known play Comedy of Errors. It takes a desi avatar on a desi terrain when a father-son pair come to know of their duplicates who are from a different city.

page35.title: Qissa
page35.description: Umber Singh is a Sikh who loses everything during the separation of India in 1947 and is forced to leave his homeland. He obsessively wishes for a male heir. When his fourth daughter is born, he decides to wage a fight against destiny.

page36.title: Dildariyaan
page36.description: A guy, Parvan, is madly in love with Paali, but she is already engaged to someone else.

page36.title: Mukhtiar Chadha
page36.description: Mukhtiar Chadha wants to be rich and successful, no matter what.

page36.title: Long Da Lishkara
page36.description: A man (Raj Babbar) must decide between true love or his family's reputation when he falls in love with a servant.

page36.title: Hero Naam Yaad Rakhi
page36.description: An Indian man visits his brother in Canada and falls in love with an Indo-Canadian woman and faces a tough task to marry her.

page36.title: Sukhmani: Hope For Life
page36.description: Sukhmani is the story of Major Kuldeep Singh who is an officer in the Para Batallion. He loses his wife and daughter to a terrorist attack in Jammu & Kashmir. Traumatized by the loss he decides to continue with his duty in order to remain sane.

page36.title: Shareek
page36.description: With agriculture controlling the economy of the state, the Punjabi farmer class, known as 'Jatts', have had only one thing on their minds when it comes to prosperity - the land. And they can go even to the extent of shedding their own brothers' blood.

page37.title: Qissa Panjab
page37.description: This film revolves around the lives of its six main protagonists. The lives of these six characters, fighting their circumstances takes a significant turn when their stories intercross each other.

page37.title: Angrej
page37.description: A thoughtful young man struggles to find a woman to marry.

page37.title: Aappan Pher Milange
page37.description: Gulab and Rajdeep are two lovers. Rajdeep wants to pursue his dreams of becoming a successful singer. Gulab's parents fix her marriage with an NRI boy against her will as her family thinks the boy as their key to get settle in Canada.

page37.title: M.L.A. Natha Singh
page37.description: A political satire using Punjab as a backdrop, 'MLA Natha Singh' directed by Satish Bhakri is a funny perspective on the political scenario in Punjab.

page37.title: Pure Punjabi
page37.description: A Story About Four Close Friends Based In Punjab Having Passion For Music. Four friends dupe their parents on the pretext of joining a medical college. What they really want to do is form a band.

page37.title: The Lion Of Punjab
page37.description: A story of a youth who is a devoted son of her motherland and stands against the anti-social elements and fights for justice by taking down every opponent who crosses his path. He is an ONE MAN ARMY in this action-packed tale.

page38.title: Viyah 70 Km
page38.description: The film is a rom-comedy film which is a story of the three friends who wish to find bride for one of their friends. This search for bride takes the three 70 Kms across the state.

page38.title: Rahe Chardi Kala Punjab Di
page38.description: Rahe Chardi Kala Punjab Di portrays social evils prevailing in our society. It shows the issues dealing with youth, unemployment, drug addiction and female foeticide.

page38.title: Ishq Garaari
page38.description: Two boys who love a starlet can do anything in their power to rescue her from the kidnapper. The kidnapper too is under the burden of love. To win the approval of his girlfriend`s father he must complete the assigned task.

page38.title: Jatt Boys Putt Jattan De
page38.description: The film tries to reduce the generation gap bringing together and blending the old and new. The film keeps intact the emotions of both the generation and gives an understanding point of view.

page38.title: Singh Vs Kaur
page38.description: Nihal Singh is a young man from a village in Nabha, who in an attempt to get rid of an unwanted marriage proposal, ends up lying to his entire village that he loves somebody named 'Jasneet Kaur' (Surveen Chawla) from Vancouver

page38.title: Kaun Kise Da Beli
page38.description: The film is about the family principles and values and revolves around a Punjabi Family trying to survive the changing values and ambitions. One of the best Punjabi Movies about Punjabi Families and relations.
